#summary Definition of thunks.
#labels Glossary

= Thunk =

A thunk is a [Arity nullary] (i.e. zero-argument) function that returns a constant value. In Cat thunks are created using the [Quote quote instruction].  

A valid `thunk` definition would be: 

{{{
define thunk : ('a -> ( -> 'a))
{ quote }
}}}
